properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
URUGUAY.
DNC 01, DNC 07.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V BGP CHALLENGER TOWING
   12000 METER LONG CABLES:
   A. 07 DEC ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      35-33.17S 050-34.60W AND 37-49.13S 052-48.52W.
   B. 07 THRU 09 DEC ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      37-45.82S 052-53.90W AND 35-29.82S 050-39.80W.
   TEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2978/14.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 10 DEC 14.
